name: Rexko
body:
Rexko is a project to develop a tool to create and publish dictionary data.  It has been in use for the past few years to create the entries for the Latin dictionary at [ttt.frath.net](http://ttt.frath.net/); recently we have been working on transitioning the application from an internal tool to one suitable for public use.  

# Demo

You can see what Rexko looks like in action at [demo.rexko.org](http://demo.rexko.org/).

# Screenshots
